snippet: John Witzl Walters, a painter who lost his studio and home, is among those who may stick around for yet another rebirth in Georgetown, S.C.
abstract: Residents of Georgetown, SC, are trying to figure out what the future holds in the wake of September fire that gutted seven waterfront commercial buildings; town has struggled for a century and a half to recapture its antebellum glory and, at least before the fire, it seemed that it was on the right track.
lead_paragraph: John Witzl Walters, a painter who lost his studio and home, is among those who may stick around for yet another rebirth in Georgetown, S.C.

headline.main: After Downtown Fire, a Historic South Carolina City Ponders Its Next Steps
headline.print_headline: After Downtown Fire, a Historic South Carolina City Ponders Its Next Steps
